entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a mental image of himself in a top hat and tails. He is also referred to as Potter by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as a firm authority figure who expects Harry to dance with a partner.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall has authority over Harry, as she is his teacher and expects him to follow her instructions.
